name: gfb
title: Get FotMob Fixtures
description: Returns football results from FotMob's API for specific leagues and teams for 7 days in the past and 30 days in the future.
author: jamtur01

commands.name: index
commands.title: Show Football Fixtures
commands.description: Returns football fixtures from the FotMob API

preferences.name: leagueTeamPairs
preferences.title: League and Team ID Pairs
preferences.description: Enter league and team ID pairs separated by a comma. Format: leagueID1:teamID1, leagueID2:teamID2. E.g., '9134:189397, 9907:401657'. You can find the IDs in the URL paths at the FotMob site: https://www.fotmob.com/.
